nodes.name: _getSettingVariables

params._value: the max amount they can spend

params._extraData: some extra information to send to the approved contract
params._value: the max amount they can spend

approvePrimordial(address,uint256).details: Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` Primordial ions in your behalf

params._value: The max amount they can spend

approvePrimordialAndCall(address,uint256.details: Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` Primordial ions in your behalf, and then ping the contract about it

params._extraData: some extra information to send to the approved contract
params._value: The max amount they can spend

availableETH().details: Get maximum quantity of AOETH or ETH that can still be sold
availableETH().return: The maximum quantity of AOETH or ETH that can still be sold

availablePrimordialForSale().details: Get quantity of AO+ left in Network Exchange
availablePrimordialForSale().return: The quantity of AO+ left in Network Exchange

availablePrimordialForSaleInETH().details: Get quantity of AO+ in ETH left in Network Exchange (i.e How much ETH is there total that can be	exchanged for AO+
availablePrimordialForSaleInETH().return: The quantity of AO+ in ETH left in Network Exchange

params._value: the amount of money to burn
the amount of money to burn

burnPrimordial(uint256).details: Remove `_value` Primordial ions from the system irreversibly	and re-weight the account's multiplier after burn

burnPrimordialFrom(address,uint256).details: Remove `_value` Primordial ions from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`	and re-weight `_from`'s multiplier after burn

buy().details: Buy ions from contract by sending ether

buyPrimordial().details: Buy Primordial ions from contract by sending ether

buyPrimordialWithAOETH(uint256).details: Buy Primordial ion from contract by sending AOETH

calculateMaximumBurnAmount(address).details: Calculate the maximum amount of Primordial an account can burn
calculateMaximumBurnAmount(address).return: The maximum primordial ion amount to burn

calculateMultiplierAfterBurn(address,uin.details: Calculate account's new multiplier after burn `_amountToBurn` primordial ions

params._amountToBurn: The amount of primordial ion to burn

calculateMultiplierAfterConversion(addre.details: Calculate account's new multiplier after converting `amountToConvert` network ion to primordial ion

params._amountToConvert: The amount of network ion to convert

calculateMultiplierAndBonus(uint256).details: Calculate the primordial ion multiplier, bonus network ion percentage, and the	bonus network ion amount on a given lot when someone purchases primordial ion	during network exchange

params._purchaseAmount: The amount of primordial ion intended to be purchased

calculateMultiplierAndBonus(uint256).return: The multiplier in (10 ** 6)The bonus percentageThe amount of network ion as bonus

convertToPrimordial(uint256).details: Convert `_value` of network ions to primordial ions	and re-weight the account's multiplier after conversion

endNetworkExchange().details: Only the AO can force end network exchange

params._value: The amount of network ions to put in escrow

freezeAccount(address,bool).details: Prevent/Allow target from sending & receiving ions

params.freeze: Either to freeze it or not

maxMultiplierByAddress(address).details: Return the max multiplier of an address
maxMultiplierByAddress(address).return: the max multiplier of the address (in 10 ** 6)

mint(address,uint256).details: Create `mintedAmount` ions and send it to `target`

params.mintedAmount: The amount of ions it will receive

mintEscrow(address,uint256).details: Create `mintedAmount` ions and send it to `target` escrow balance

params.mintedAmount: The amount of ions it will receive in escrow

params.amount: The amount of ions to be sold

setAODevTeamAddresses(address,address).details: Set AO Dev team addresses to receive Primordial/Network ions during network exchange

params._aoDevTeam1: The first AO dev team address
params._aoDevTeam2: The second AO dev team address

setAOSettingAddress(address).details: The AO sets AO Setting address

setNameAccountRecoveryAddress(address).details: The AO set the NameAccountRecovery Address

setNamePublicKeyAddress(address).details: The AO set the NamePublicKey Address

setNameTAOPositionAddress(address).details: The AO set the NameTAOPosition Address

setPrices(uint256,uint256).details: Allow users to buy ions for `newBuyPrice` eth and sell ions for `newSellPrice` eth

params.newBuyPrice: Price users can buy from the contract
params.newSellPrice: Price users can sell to the contract

setPrimordialPrices(uint256,uint256).details: Allow users to buy Primordial ions for `newBuyPrice` eth and sell Primordial ions for `newSellPrice` eth

params.newPrimordialBuyPrice: Price users can buy from the contract
params.newPrimordialSellPrice: Price users can sell to the contract

setSettingTAOId(address).details: The AO sets setting TAO ID

params._settingTAOId: The new setting TAO ID to set

setWhitelist(address,bool).details: Whitelist `_account` address to transact on behalf of others

stakePrimordialFrom(address,uint256,uint.details: Stake `_value` Primordial ions at `_weightedMultiplier ` multiplier on behalf of `_from`

params._value: The amount of Primordial ions to stake
params._weightedMultiplier: The weighted multiplier of the Primordial ions

transferEth(address,uint256).details: Allows TheAO to transfer `_amount` of ETH from this address to `_recipient`

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfer ownership of The AO to new address

params._theAO: The new address to be transferred

transferPrimordial(address,uint256).details: Send `_value` Primordial ions to `_to` from your account

params._value: The amount of escrowed network ions to be released

unstakePrimordialFrom(address,uint256,ui.details: Unstake `_value` Primordial ions at `_weightedMultiplier` on behalf of `_from`

params._weightedMultiplier: The weighted multiplier of the Primordial ions

weightedMultiplierByAddress(address).details: Return the average weighted multiplier of all lots owned by an address

params._lotOwner: The address of the lot owner

weightedMultiplierByAddress(address).return: the weighted multiplier of the address (in 10 ** 6)

whitelistBurnFrom(address,uint256).details: Whitelisted address remove `_value` ions from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.

params._value: the amount of money to burn

whitelistTransferFrom(address,address,ui.details: Whitelisted address transfer ions from other address	 * Send `_value` ions to `_to` on behalf of `_from`

whitelistTransferPrimordialFrom(address,.details: Send `_value` primordial ions to `_to` on behalf of `_from`

approve(address,uint256).notice: Set allowance for other address	 * Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` ions in your behalf

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Set allowance for other address and notify	 * Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` ions in your behalf, and then ping the contract about it

burn(uint256).notice: Destroy ions	 * Remove `_value` ions from the system irreversibly

burnFrom(address,uint256).notice: Destroy ions from other account	 * Remove `_value` ions from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfer ions	 * Send `_value` ions to `_to` from your account

transferBetweenPublicKeys(address,addres.notice: Transfer ions between public key addresses in a Name

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer ions from other address	 * Send `_value` ions to `_to` in behalf of `_from`

transferPrimordialBetweenPublicKeys(addr.notice: Transfer primordial ions between public key addresses in a Name
